name: luckygames-tips
description: Do more in Luckygames with Tips

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && javascript-obfuscator ../wordpress/skript --output ./ --compact true --rename-globals false --unicode-escape-sequence true && cpx src/index.ts ../wordpress/skript && cpx src/Data/Json/*.json ../wordpress/skript
scripts.build-dev: tsc -p tsconfig.json && cpx src/index.ts ../wordpress/skript && cpx src/Data/Json/*.json ../wordpress/skript

author: contact@luckygames.tips
